channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-4009] GeoTopic Parser package changed incorrectly from o.a.t.parser.geo from o.a.t.parser.geo.topic
item.description: The package for the GeoTopicParser was incorrectly changed. It should be changed back.
item.summary: GeoTopic Parser package changed incorrectly from o.a.t.parser.geo from o.a.t.parser.geo.topic

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
OK, I have a patch and commit forthcoming but it's fixed and work:
